import React from "react"; import "./style.scss"; import Button from "storybook/atom/Button/button"; import { formatterUS } from "utils"; import Loader from "storybook/atom/Loader/loader"; const VotingEsCrow = ({ flag = true, isDark = true, onClickStake = () => {}, onClickUnStake = () => {}, stakedAll = 0, tresrBalance = 0, tresrStakedAllBalance = 0, balanceEstDailyVeTRESR = 0, }) => { return (
Earn Voting Escrow
{stakedAll}
{flag && (
)}
Total $TRESR staked
  • Avavilable $TRESR
    {formatterUS(tresrBalance)} {flag && (
    )}
  • Est. Daily veTRESR
    {balanceEstDailyVeTRESR} {flag && (
    )}
  • Community Staked
    {formatterUS(tresrStakedAllBalance)} {flag && (
    )}
); }; export default VotingEsCrow;
